title: 115_s1811
content: Merger Enforcement Improvement Act This bill modifies antitrust enforcement requirements regarding mergers . Specifically,nbsp, the bill: adjusts premerger notification filing fees. Requires certain filers to report to the Federal Trade Commission (FTC) ornbsp, to the relevant Assistant Attorney Generalnbsp, on information that allows the governmentnbsp, to assess the competitive impact of a merger. Requires the FTC to study overlapping ownership or control by investors in certain markets. And requires the Government Accountability Office to assess the success of certain merger remedies and the impact of mergers and acquisitions on wages, employment, innovation, and new business formation.
